mapper.select: select reply.*, board.member_nick as board_member_nick, m.member_owner, uimg.attachment_no from dang_reply reply left outer join dang_board board on reply.board_no=board.board_no left outer join dang_member m on board.member_no=m.member_no left outer join user_img uimg on m.user_no=uimg.user_no where reply.board_no=#{boardNo} order by reply.reply_no asc
select count(*) from dang_reply where member_no=#{memberNo}
